name: QuizKoala- Which ER doc are you? 2.0
name_original: QuizKoala- Which ER doc are you? 2.0
description:
Remember the 90s? Remember the 00s?  Feel old yet? Memento mori?

It's a quiz.  But is it really a quiz? 

I see you're questioning the nature of reality. But are you really questioning it the nature of reality?

Imagine you find an antique quiz made by a TV show fanatic, in semi-pristine condition. Imagine it's 2008 (or not!?) This is what I would put out on the internet back then, if I could time travel to a time when ER was still on the air. 

Content warnings are in the first segment and throughout where appropriate- email inkybmo@gmail.com with anything missed please!

This project takes the player through the quiz 5 times, with the ability to explore some different scenarios and find weird stuff, but (spoilers) the results will always come in the same order. My coding/html skills aren't perfect, but I think I made due, especially with the idea of any weird buggy formatting being chalked up to this being made decades ago with little education on coding/html. A fun way to use a weakness, I guess.

Enjoy!

-BMO

made for pccmm271, winter 2021
